DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients , male female race ethnicity , 18 year age old , diagnose ocular hypertension openangle glaucoma ( without pseudoexfoliative pigmentary dispersion component ) . 2 . Stable use Latanoprost 0.005 % minimum 30 day prior screen visit . 3 . VA 20/200 good either eye 4 . Pachymetry 600 micron less 5 . Visual Field within 6 month screen visit 6 . Patients use contact lens allow participate provide remove lenses 15 minute dose 7 . Patients satisfy inform consent requirement may include study . 1 . Significant ocular surface abnormality 7 . Patients form glaucoma ocular hypertension openangle glaucoma 8 . Patients investigational therapy within 30 day prior screen visit 9 .
